Citations, References and the Growth of Scientific Literature: A Model of Dynamic Interaction .A Krauze, Tadeusz K. .A Hillinger, Claude A mathematical model is presented which explains the observed exponential growth rates of citations and references in a scientific discipline.. The independent variables are the growth rate of the number of articles published and the decay rate of citation of old literature..
